name: Parent-Child table
others fields desc: Other fields outside of the parent-child structure can be indicator or dimension fields.
row hover bg desc: The background color of hover row
expand levels desc: Specify from which level the default expansion starts, if not specified, all will be expanded without collapsing.

cell bg event.row data: The record data of the row where the cell is located.
cell bg event.column id: The column ID where the cell is located.
cell bg event.row index: The row index where the cell is located.
cell bg event.default color: The default color code of the background for the cell.
cell bg event.return desc: The returned value will be used as the background color code for the cell.
cell bg event.event desc: A custom event for cell background color, which will be executed every time the table renders and updates the content of each cell.
